products.query: query GetProducts($first: Int!, $after: String) { products(first: $first, after: $after) { pageInfo { hasNextPage endCursor } edges { node { id title handle description vendor productType availableForSale priceRange { minVariantPrice { amount currencyCode } } images(first: 5) { edges { node { url altText } } } variants(first: 10) { edges { node { id title price { amount currencyCode } availableForSale } } } } } } }

collections.query: query GetCollections { collections(first: 10) { edges { node { id title handle description image { url altText } } } } }

cart.create: mutation CreateCart($lines: [CartLineInput!]) { cartCreate(input: { lines: $lines }) { cart { id checkoutUrl totalQuantity cost { totalAmount { amount currencyCode } } } userErrors { field message } } }
cart.add: mutation AddToCart($cartId: ID!, $lines: [CartLineInput!]!) { cartLinesAdd(cartId: $cartId, lines: $lines) { cart { id checkoutUrl totalQuantity } userErrors { field message } } }
